unnormalised: Ayurveda sounds amazing! I've heard great things about panchakarma at Kerala Ayurveda clinics. My Dadi swears by it for her arthritis, says it's better than any Rs. 5000 painkiller! Planning a trip to Rishikesh around 10/10/2024 for a proper consultation. Anyone tried specific treatments like shirodhara? What about post-treatment dietary restrictions, like avoiding curd after 07:00 pm? Need tips before my 14-day detox starting 01/01/2025!
